N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 143.8 - Allowances

State Regulations

The term
allowances
means any deduction
for gratuities, and any charge or deduction for meals, lodging, apparel, and
other such items, services and facilities furnished by an employer to an
employee when the employee must utilize such items, services or facilities as a
condition of his employment. Notes
